title: libgo configure should be regenerated with newer libtool
body:
by **fxcoudert**: 
For compilation of libgo on recent darwin version (OS 10.10 Yosemite), libgo's configure
script should be regenerated with a newer libtool. GCC repository will be updated
similarly: https://gcc.gnu.org/ml/gcc-patches/2014-11/msg00930.html
